text: @realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump I enjoyed the timeline presentation during the White House Coronavirus Task Force briefing today—FACTS. Thank you for the work and consideration of the many aspects to support the American people and around the world, and fight this pandemic #KAG2020 🇺🇸
